name: @photoeditor/backend
description: Backend services for photo editor application

scripts.build:lambdas: npm run clean && npm run build:lambda:presign && npm run build:lambda:status && npm run build:lambda:worker && npm run build:lambda:download
scripts.build:lambda:presign: esbuild src/lambdas/presign.ts --bundle --outdir=dist/lambdas/presign --platform=node --target=node20 --format=cjs --external:@aws-sdk/* --external:sharp --minify && cd dist/lambdas/presign && zip -q presign.zip presign.js
scripts.build:lambda:status: esbuild src/lambdas/status.ts --bundle --outdir=dist/lambdas/status --platform=node --target=node20 --format=cjs --external:@aws-sdk/* --external:sharp --minify && cd dist/lambdas/status && zip -q status.zip status.js
scripts.build:lambda:worker: esbuild src/lambdas/worker.ts --bundle --outdir=dist/lambdas/worker --platform=node --target=node20 --format=cjs --external:@aws-sdk/* --external:sharp --minify && cd dist/lambdas/worker && zip -q worker.zip worker.js
scripts.build:lambda:download: esbuild src/lambdas/download.ts --bundle --outdir=dist/lambdas/download --platform=node --target=node20 --format=cjs --external:@aws-sdk/* --external:sharp --minify && cd dist/lambdas/download && zip -q download.zip download.js
scripts.build:bff: npm run build:lambda:presign && npm run build:lambda:status && npm run build:lambda:download
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2e:setup && npm run test:e2e:run && npm run test:e2e:teardown
scripts.test:pre-e2e: npm run test:build && npm run test:import
scripts.dep:graph: depcruise src --output-type dot | dot -T svg > dependency-graph.svg
